wm-license-cc-by-sa-3.0-text: A gbaŋe ŋa soobo be la [[{{int:wm-license-cc-wiki-link}}|Creative Commons]][[creativecommons:by-sa/3.0/deed.en|Attribution-share Alike 3.0 Unported]] license.
wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: ka fo naŋ tɔgele, ŋmɛyaare ane toɔle a toma
wm-license-cc-conditions: A yi a sobie ama yuoŋ:
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: Aseŋ ka fo tere emmuo naŋ senne,a wanne  sase-miri naŋ wullo o sobuo ane ka tɛgere kaŋ eɛ. Fo na baŋ eɛ lɛ yi lɛ na zaa fõõ naŋ boɔrɔ, kyɛ ka a ta e ŋa o soba la ko fo sori bee fo de tonne.
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: Ka fooŋ wa leɛ laŋtaa, leɛre kyɛ bee mɛ poɔ a yɛlɛ mineŋ see ka fo poŋ a fo boma na fo naŋ leɛre. [https://creativecommons.org/share-your-work/licensing-considerations/compatible- a lɛ ne o zu bee sagedeebo laasene] ka o e a papa meŋa.
